Package clishell

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    NamedPlugin  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CliCommandOptions
    Object to store the set of commands (and associated value, if any) specified on the command line for a specific command
    CliCommandParser  
    CliMethod  
    CliOptionParser
    Parser for CLI command Options.
    CliPluginCommandMetadata  
    CliPluginLoader
    Loads and unloads CLI plugins
    CliPluginMetadata
    Class to store & manage metadata about a loaded CLI Plugin instance
    CliPluginMethodMetadata
    Stores metadata about a java method that can be called by the CLI.
    CliProperties
    Custom Extension to java.util.Properties for CliShell, supporting following enhancements: getProperties enhancements:
    Resolution of property references - the overridden getProperty methods will resolve references to other properties using the syntax: ${property-name} Two new getProperty methods: getProperty(String name, Class klass) and a variant of that taking a defaultValue parameter - can be used to return new instances of objects using values configured in the property file
    getDottedProperty enhancements:
    New flavor of "get property" methods: "getDottedProperty" A "dotted property name" is a property name comprising zero or more "components", separated by a dot ('.') character.
    CliRunner
    Main CLI Class
    CommandName  
    ConsoleStack<T>
    Manages "stack" of "console I/O objects of type T".
    FullCommandNameTree
    Class to manages multi-word "command names" as tree of words.
    StringListParser  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CliMethodForm
